title: Climate Action
content: Promotes climate education, sustainable lifestyle, and sustainable development, inspired by global advocates and aims to fight climate change by modeling responsible practices.

title: Good Governance
content: Envisions a future where competent leaders and citizens work together towards peace and the common good, with special focus on the underprivileged and rural poor.

title: Youth Empowerment
content: Aims to empower the youth to become catalysts of change, recognizing their innovative potential to solve society's issues and shape the country's future.

title: Quality Education
content: Champions the right to quality and inclusive education, creating community partnerships and projects aimed at maximizing learning and decreasing educational barriers.

title: Holistic Health
content: Focuses on physical, mental, social, and spiritual growth, fostering an environment that encourages holistic development aligned with Ignatian ideals.

title: SOGIESC
content: Promotes inclusivity and gender sensitivity, advocating for SOGIE-specific education and the Anti-Discrimination Bill to protect LGBTQ+ rights.
